unnormalised: Payment gateways, the unsung heroes of online retail! Without them, buying that perfect saree for Diwali would be like trying to find a needle in a haystack... made of biryani! Seriously though, choosing one is tougher than clearing the IIT entrance exam. I remember Ramesh uncle lost Rs. 5000 once because of a dodgy one. Ab toh UPI zindabad!
